sentences.en: After some period of time, she will be resold to another brothel owner, often in another country, and the cycle will continue all over again.
sentences.cn: 经过一段时间以后，她可能又被转卖给另一个国家的另一个妓院老板，于是循环将再重复一遍。

sentences.en: BROKEN MIRRORS is set for the most part in an Amsterdam brothel.
sentences.cn: 奠定格里丝女性电影惊悚大师的成名作!

sentences.en: That was much cheaper than going to a brothel.
When she refused his advances he had her sent to a brothel.
sentences.cn: 在遭到阿嘉莎的拒绝后，他把她送到了一所妓院之中。
